Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory700.jpg'}
{3: 'By early morning, the conservation area is already awake. The sky is bright and clear, and your steps grow lighter as you make your way to the appointment.'}

{3: 'The bustle along the path feels different from anywhere else. Humans and Constructs alike walk with animal companions—dogs of every shape and size, each wearing a name tag, full of energy as they play or train.'}
{1: '1004', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory974.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory974.jpg'}
{3: 'You arrive at the door of a quiet, out-of-the-way house. Just as you reach for the bell, the door opens.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "Good morning, Commandant. You're always punctual.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The morning light paints the blue-haired Construct's silhouette in a thin sheen of gold. She holds herself with the poise of a young lady, yet a trace of excitement hides in her eyes."}
{3: 'A furry head pops out from behind her and barks at you cheerfully in greeting.'}
{3: 'A warm, inviting aroma of food drifts out from inside the house.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Come in. Breakfast is ready.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Today's menu is fried sausages, tomato-baked beans, and buttered potato wedges. Best eaten while hot.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll dig in, then.", 3: '28', 4: 'Thank you for going to the trouble.', 5: '29'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Yes, that's exactly what I intended.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "It's no trouble. I don't have many things I can say I'm good at, but cooking is one of them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'And thank you for teaming up with me for the Paw Guardian event and helping train Ksori. Let me return the favor with a proper meal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "I'll remember your tastes, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Speaking of training, Ksori handled the last program pretty well.', 3: '36'}
{2: "Do you think we should move on to the next phase? I'd like your thoughts.", 3: '37'}
{1: '1', 3: "As if she understands the praise, Ksori's tail wags harder, though she stays perfectly seated."}
{1: '1', 3: "The blue-haired girl bends down to rub the dog's head, her smile soft and subtle."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Something to talk about over tea later? I'd enjoy that.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory700.jpg'}
{1: '"Canine Haven"', 2: 'Surface Conservation Area', 4: 'One week ago'}
{3: 'One week earlier, at Canine Haven in the surface conservation area.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: "Your earlier suggestions were a huge help in developing our working dog training program. As expected from Babylonia's Chief Commandant—your ground mission experience really shows.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: "Thank you for taking the time to visit Canine Haven. Did you sleep well last night? This way, please. The working dogs' kennels are just ahead.", 4: '1'}
{3: "As the surface conservation area develops, people have started turning their attention to humanity's longtime companions—the dogs who arrived alongside the refugees."}

{3: 'Experience has shown that dogs have unique abilities in search and rescue, finding supplies, and guiding people with disabilities—skills that can be a real asset to ground operations. To tap into that potential, the conservation area has set up a dedicated program for training working dogs.'}
{3: "With some free time on your hands, you accepted Canine Haven's invitation to serve as a temporary advisor."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: "And we have some good news—we finally secured enough sponsorship to host a large-scale training competition. We're calling it Paw Guardian.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What a cute name.', 3: '63', 4: 'What a goofy name.', 5: '63'}

{2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: "It's meant to encourage more people to sign up. The rules are simple: two trainers work with one dog to complete the training program in our manual, then take part in a final competition. The dogs that perform best can join our operational teams right away!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: 'Would you like to participate too, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you can answer, a commotion breaks out nearby. A small crowd gathers, watching something.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Staff Member', 3: "It wasn't like this when its owner was still alive. Shame, the poor old man had only just brought it here, and he...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Staff Member B', 3: "Yeah. Now it's scared of everyone. Maybe we should... let it be.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Blue-haired Construct', 3: "But Ksori's earlier test scores were outstanding. If you'll allow it, I'd like to try working with her.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Looking closer, you spot a familiar figure.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Discord from the Scarab squad speaks in earnest. In the fenced area ahead, a brown-and-white dog is tethered, ears flat, curled up tightly—clearly terrified.'}
{3: 'A man in a suit sighs at her words, his expression tinged with reluctance.'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "Young lady, what good are test scores if the dog is too afraid to even face people? We're just worried about your safety.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Safety?', 3: '93', 4: 'What happened?', 5: '93'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "Commandant? I didn't expect to see you here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The blue-haired Construct looks surprised to see you and gives a polite nod. The suited man, noticing this, steps forward with sudden enthusiasm.'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "Well, if it isn't the famous Gray Raven Commandant! An honor, truly!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You flatter me.', 3: '102', 4: 'May I ask who you are...', 5: '102'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: 'Commandant, this is Mr. Kaiji, our new sponsor.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Kaiji', 3: "You see, it's just a scared dog. No need to trouble the advisor with this. Best to dispose of it so it doesn't disrupt the training or competition. As for this Construct lady...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He finishes speaking and glances at Discord, looking slightly unsure.'}
{3: "You're close enough to see the blue-haired girl's expression go blank for an instant, though she doesn't say a word."}
{2: 'Discord, what do you think?', 3: '113'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'I need to check something first, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'This dog, Ksori, has been through repeated abuse and abandonment. The death of her last owner left her deeply traumatized.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "I used to visit her often, and she was fond of me. If she still lets me come close, then there's a chance we can... turn this around.", 4: '1'}
{3: "An elite Construct can handle herself. Perhaps it's your calm confidence, but Kaiji narrows his eyes, then steps back with you to join the crowd, giving Discord space to work."}
{1: '1', 3: 'The blue-haired girl crouches, locking eyes with the shivering dog.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Ksori? It's me.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The lone dog's front paws twitch nervously. She knows there's no escape, but still whimpers, looking around as if trying to dodge an unseen demon.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ksori', 3: 'Woof, woof!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory755.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Concordia', 3: "It's all my fault... They don't want me... They don't want me anymore!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory700.jpg'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Ksori, I'm back. I came for you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Something has changed imperceptibly. Ksori stops scraping at the ground, and the sound of pain in her throat fades.'}
{1: '1', 3: "One step. Then another. She closes the distance, inch by inch. The crowd holds its breath as her hand reaches the dog's matted fur."}
{3: "Ksori doesn't pull away. Instead, she tilts his head up and hesitantly licks Discord's arm.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Staff Member', 3: "Ksori actually accepts you! I knew it'd be a shame to waste its talent. With a bit of work, it could even place in the top three—ow! What was that for?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Staff Member B', 3: "Haha... yeah, didn't expect that.", 4: '2'}

{1: '1', 3: 'The girl straightens up, folding her hands neatly in front of her. She gives you a small but unmistakably relieved smile, then glances around the crowd, her gaze lingering on Kaiji for a moment.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "As you can see, I'm perfectly capable of serving as Ksori's trainer.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kaiji', 3: "Not bad. But the rules say you need two trainers. Registration's closing soon. Where are you going to find another person who'll get the same special treatment?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kaiji', 3: 'Anyone else want to try?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Staff Member B', 3: "Everyone here's already had a go. No luck.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Male Staff Member', 3: "Not everyone. The Gray Raven Commandant hasn't tried yet!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'In an instant, all eyes are on you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "The Commandant's schedule is full. It wouldn't be fair to ask at the last minute.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her hands tighten slightly around her skirt, and her voice—usually calm and steady—carries a barely noticeable hint of urgency.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Still, Commandant... would you be willing to sign up with me? You wouldn't have to do the training. Just having your name down is enough.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Let me try approaching her.', 3: '190', 4: "I'm not letting you handle this on your own.", 5: '190'}
{2: 'I already have an invitation. I just need a partner.', 3: '193'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'So... you believe in Ksori too, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'So... you believe in Ksori too, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I believe in her.', 3: '196', 4: 'I trust your judgment.', 5: '200'}
{3: 'A faint light of hope begins to glow in her eyes.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Thank you, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Ksori won't let you down.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A faint light of hope begins to glow in her eyes.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Thank you, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "I'll protect you and not let you know. You have my word.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'While soothing Ksori, Discord quietly wraps the leash twice around her wrist.'}
{3: 'Under her focused gaze, you follow her example, moving toward the dog with slow, steady steps.'}

{1: '1', 3: "To everyone's surprise, Ksori, still wary of the crowd, peeks out from behind Discord's legs. She meets your eyes for a moment, nose twitching, then cautiously shuffles a small step toward you.", 4: '2', 5: '1'}
{2: '(Pat Ksori on the head)', 3: '223', 4: "(Stroke the fur on Ksori's neck)", 5: '223'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: "Well, would you look at that! The Commandant's got a way with dogs too!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Staff Member', 3: "I'd say it's the Commandant's presence. Dogs can feel it.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "You lift your head to meet the girl's gaze. Her joy is quiet, her eyes shining like small blue flowers blooming across a barren field."}
{2: 'Kaiji', 3: "Alright, alright, looks like that's settled nicely.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kaiji', 3: "Didn't expect Ksori to land our advisor as a teammate. That's quite the stroke of luck. I've got a clever dog of my own, so... see you in the competition!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kaiji hurries away. His farewell is polite enough, but something about him still leaves you uneasy.'}
{3: 'The priority now is registration. You make a mental note of your suspicion and head off with Discord, following the unusually cheerful staff member.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: "That's all the paperwork done. We'll deliver the gear and supplies straight to the dorm assigned to Miss Construct here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: "The location's a bit out of the way since our training dogs aren't used to crowds yet... hope that's okay.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "That's fine. Thank you for arranging it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: "Good luck! I'm sure you'll do great and give Paw Guardian another strong contender!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The blue-haired Construct meets your gaze with quiet determination, her resolve as steady as her movements.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Come on, Commandant. Let's take Ksori home.", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
